title: Before the Shroud
description: Our world today is protected by the shroud: an invisible barrier that keeps creatures of untold darkness from devouring mankind.It wasn’t always this way. There was a time when the shroud didn’t exist. In another world, men and women struggled to survive the rigors of life. In all things there must be a beginning. This is that beginning - a telling of a time before the shroud, and the catalyst that triggered the end.
author: Scott   Richards
